The EU's strategy for microchips

The EU's strategy for microchips has made reasonable progress in its implementation, but it is unlikely to be sufficient to reach the overly ambitious Digital Decade target. The Chips Act provided new momentum after the 2013 Strategy failed to meet its main objective. However, the Act had several gaps and the Commission does not have complete information on its funding or contribution to EU objectives.
